featured.text: After you plunk your money down, Dognition’s website will take you through a questionnaire about your dog: For example, how excited does your dog get around other dogs, or children?
The theory behind the questionnaire used in the Dognition test.

definition.zh_def: 一組用於收集信息或意見的問題，通常以書面形式呈現。
definition.en_def: A set of questions used to gather information or opinions, typically presented in written form.
definition.example: The company distributed a questionnaire to gather feedback from its customers.
